mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_팝업기본 조회 (PopupMapper.getPopup) */ SELECT popup_sn ,popup_ttl ,popup_pstg_bgng_ymd ,popup_pstg_end_ymd ,popup_lnkg_addr ,popup_seq ,popup_pstg_yn ,popup_npag_yn ,popup_expln ,atch_file_id ,wrtr_dept_nm ,mdfr_dept_nm ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_POPUP" WHERE 1=1 AND popup_sn = #{popupSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_팝업기본 수정 (PopupMapper.updatePopup) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_POPUP" SET popup_ttl = coalesce(#{popupTtl}, popup_ttl) ,popup_pstg_bgng_ymd = coalesce(#{popupPstgBgngYmd}, popup_pstg_bgng_ymd) ,popup_pstg_end_ymd = coalesce(#{popupPstgEndYmd}, popup_pstg_end_ymd) ,popup_lnkg_addr = coalesce(#{popupLnkgAddr}, popup_lnkg_addr) ,popup_seq = coalesce(#{popupSeq}, popup_seq) ,popup_pstg_yn = coalesce(#{popupPstgYn}, popup_pstg_yn) ,popup_npag_yn = coalesce(#{popupNpagYn}, popup_npag_yn) ,popup_expln = coalesce(#{popupExpln}, popup_expln) ,atch_file_id = coalesce(#{atchFileId}, atch_file_id) ,wrtr_dept_nm = coalesce(#{wrtrDeptNm}, wrtr_dept_nm) ,mdfr_dept_nm = coalesce(#{mdfrDeptNm}, mdfr_dept_nm) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND popup_sn = #{popupSn}
